article_title: When Trump’s time in spotlight ends, darkness awaits the discontented
article_text:
Hillary Clinton, like most of us, never enters the world of alienated Americans

She should spend a week with a group of Trump supporters, not telling what she will do for them but letting them tell her who they are, why they are angry, why they have lost faith in the American dream

Then there would be hope

article_metadata.news-keywords: trump, clinton, president, race, powers, UNC, sociology, professor, voters, anger, society, jobs, wages, pay, poor, americans

Then there would be hope.
